1   package org.infinispan.configuration.cache;
2   
3   import java.util.ArrayList;
4   import java.util.HashSet;
5   import java.util.List;
6   import java.util.Set;
7   
8   import org.infinispan.commons.CacheConfigurationException;
9   import org.infinispan.commons.configuration.Builder;
10  import org.infinispan.commons.configuration.attributes.AttributeSet;
11  import org.infinispan.configuration.global.GlobalConfiguration;
12  
13  import static org.infinispan.configuration.cache.SitesConfiguration.*;
14  
15  /**
16   * @author Mircea.Markus@jboss.com
17   * @since 5.2
18   */
19  public class SitesConfigurationBuilder extends AbstractConfigurationChildBuilder  implements Builder<SitesConfiguration> {
20     private final AttributeSet attributes;
21     private final List<BackupConfigurationBuilder> backups = new ArrayList<>(2);
22     private final BackupForBuilder backupForBuilder;
23  
24  
25     public SitesConfigurationBuilder(ConfigurationBuilder builder) {
26        super(builder);
27        attributes = SitesConfiguration.attributeDefinitionSet();
28        backupForBuilder = new BackupForBuilder(builder);
29     }
30  
31     public BackupConfigurationBuilder addBackup() {
32        BackupConfigurationBuilder bcb = new BackupConfigurationBuilder(getBuilder());
33        backups.add(bcb);
34        return bcb;
35     }
36  
37     public List<BackupConfigurationBuilder> backups() {
38        return backups;
39     }
40  
41     /**
42      * Returns true if this cache won't backup its data remotely.
43      * It would still accept other sites backing up data on this site.
44      */
45     public SitesConfigurationBuilder disableBackups(boolean disable) {
46        attributes.attribute(DISABLE_BACKUPS).set(disable);
47        return this;
48     }
49  
50     /**
51      * Defines the site names, from the list of sites names defined within 'backups' element, to
52      * which this cache backups its data.
53      */
54     public SitesConfigurationBuilder addInUseBackupSite(String site) {
55        Set<String> sites = attributes.attribute(IN_USE_BACKUP_SITES).get();
56        sites.add(site);
57        attributes.attribute(IN_USE_BACKUP_SITES).set(sites);
58        return this;
59     }
60  
61     public BackupForBuilder backupFor() {
62        return backupForBuilder;
63     }
64  
65     @Override
66     public void validate() {
67        backupForBuilder.validate();
68  
69        //don't allow two backups with the same name
70        Set<String> backupNames = new HashSet<>(backups.size());
71  
72        for (BackupConfigurationBuilder bcb : backups) {
73           if (!backupNames.add(bcb.site())) {
74              throw new CacheConfigurationException("Multiple sites with name '" + bcb.site() + "' are configured. That is not allowed!");
75           }
76           bcb.validate();
77        }
78  
79        for (String site : attributes.attribute(IN_USE_BACKUP_SITES).get()) {
80           boolean found = false;
81           for (BackupConfigurationBuilder bcb : backups) {
82              if (bcb.site().equals(site)) found = true;
83           }
84           if (!found) {
85              throw new CacheConfigurationException("The site '" + site + "' should be defined within the set of backups!");
86           }
87        }
88     }
89  
90     @Override
91     public void validate(GlobalConfiguration globalConfig) {
92        backupForBuilder.validate(globalConfig);
93  
94        for (BackupConfigurationBuilder bcb : backups) {
95           bcb.validate(globalConfig);
96        }
97     }
98  
99     @Override
100    public SitesConfiguration create() {
101       List<BackupConfiguration> backupConfigurations = new ArrayList<>(backups.size());
102       for (BackupConfigurationBuilder bcb : this.backups) {
103          backupConfigurations.add(bcb.create());
104       }
105       return new SitesConfiguration(attributes.protect(), backupConfigurations, backupForBuilder.create());
106    }
107 
108    @Override
109    public SitesConfigurationBuilder read(SitesConfiguration template) {
110       this.attributes.read(template.attributes());
111       backupForBuilder.read(template.backupFor());
112       //backups.clear();
113       for (BackupConfiguration bc : template.allBackups()) {
114          BackupConfigurationBuilder bcb = new BackupConfigurationBuilder(getBuilder());
115          bcb.read(bc);
116          backups.add(bcb);
117       }
118       return this;
119    }
120 
121 }
